item.description:
3rd Annual Great Pumpkin Halloween Ball
New England's Best Fall Craft Beer Event!
Hosted By:

BeerEncounters.com
Sponsored By: Magic Hat Brewing Company & Shipyard Brewing Company
If you’ve never been to a Beer Encounters event, now is your chance.
This is the biggest and best Halloween party our area has to offer!
Sample a wide variety of Pumpkin Ales, Oktoberfest and fall seasonal offerings!
Visit the breweries exhibit booth for free samples and giveaways!
Enjoy music from New Hampshire's own DJ Matty Z
Delicious Seasonal Food Offerings Will be Passed Throughout the Night
Witness an Incredible night of entertainment!
A diverse group of wondering entertainers has been hired to amaze you!
Win great prizes in our Costume Contest!
Prizes for Scariest, Sexiest, Best Couple and Best Over All!
Visit the fortuneteller’s tent to have Tarot Cards read by candlelight
Try your luck at Pumpkin bowling.
Witness an incredible light show with great music.
Rub elbows with costumed characters in a harrowing atmosphere.
Get an assortment of Souvenir Photos.
Visit the caricatures artist and have your own picture done.
Excellent door prizes from New England brewing companies
...and more surprises added every day!

Friday, October 30, 2009
6:30 pm until Midnight
At the Crown Plaza in Nashua, NH
6 Somerset Parkway - Nashua, NH 03063

www.BeerEncounters.com

$15 when purchased online before October 1st
$20 when purchased online during the Month of October
$30 at the door (if any tickets are available)
(You must be 21 or older to attend this event)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: 3rd Annual Great Pumpkin Halloween Ball
